data.title: Yul Edochie's wife May Yul-Edochie Biography: Age, Children, Net Worth, Instagram, Family
data.meta_description: Biography May Yul-Edochie (born September 16, 1983), whose real name is May Aligwe, is a renowned entrepreneur excelling as a media…
data.text:
Biography

May Yul-Edochie (born September 16, 1983), whose real name is May Aligwe, is a renowned entrepreneur excelling as a media personality.

She happens to be the first wife of the renowned Nollywood actor Yul Edochie and is not only recognized for her marital relationship but also for her impressive accomplishments as a Nigerian entrepreneur.

May Yul-Edochie is the CEO of DKK Investment, a prominent company demonstrating her remarkable business talents and industry understanding. Her unquestionable success and dedication inspire budding entrepreneurs in Nigeria and beyond.

Nigerian entrepreneur ‧ Yul Edochie’s wife

May Yul-Edochie May Yul-Edochie: History ‧ Bio ‧ Photo Wiki Facts & About Data Full Name: May Aligwe Stage Name: May Yul-Edochie Born: 16 September 1983 (age 40 years old) Place of Birth: Anambra, Nigeria State Of Origin: Anambra State Nationality: Nigerian Education: University of Port Harcourt Height: 1.72 m Parents: Mr. & Mrs. Aligwe Siblings: Blessing Nwele Spouse: Yul Edochie (m. 2004) Boyfriend • Partner: N/A Children: Kambi Edochie, Dani Edochie, Karl Edochie, Zane Yul-Edochie Occupation: Entrepreneur • Internet Personality Net Worth: US$250,000

Early Life & Education

May Yul-Edochie, a celebrity spouse, was born on September 16, 1983, in Anambra State, Nigeria. She was raised by her parents, whose names have remained unknown to the media. However, they can be referred to as Mr. and Mrs. Aligwe.

Additionally, May Yul-Edochie has a beloved big sister named Blessing Nwele. These experiences shaped her early life as she pursued her education in both primary and secondary school within the Southeast geopolitical zone of Nigeria. She graduated from the University of Port Harcourt.

Career

May Yul-Edochie, a Nigerian entrepreneur, has been dedicated to building her brand for a considerable amount of time. However, her marriage to the well-known Nigerian actor Yul Edochie catapulted her into the limelight.

Alongside her entrepreneurial pursuits, May also holds the prestigious position of chairman at DKK Investment Company. Her husband, Yul Edochie, is celebrated in the Nigerian film industry for his remarkable performances in numerous Nollywood movies.

In addition to being a well-known philanthropist, May Yul-Edochie owns May’s Oasis Foundation, a non-governmental organization dedicated to assisting widows, the less privileged, and victims of violence in Nigeria and the Diaspora.

Furthermore, May Yul-Edochie is a dedicated and supportive wife who supports her husband’s side, helping him succeed in his political career and the entertainment industry.

Social Media

Instagram handle: May Yul-Edochie (@mayyuledochie)

Tiktok handle: MAY YUL-EDOCHIE (@mayyuledochie)

Personal Life

May Yul-Edochie is married to Yul Edochie, a well-known figure in the Nigerian film industry as an actor, producer, and director. They tied the knot at a young age in 2004 after meeting each other as students at the University of Port Harcourt.

Together, they have been blessed with four children: one daughter and three sons. They were a young couple who met at the University of Port Harcourt. Together, they have four children – one daughter named Kambi Edochie and three sons named Dani Edochie, Karl Edochie, and Zane Yul-Edochie, who is also known as Victory Zane Chukwubuike Yul-Edochie.

On November 30, 2023, Rita Edochie and Judy Austin Yul-Edochie, Yul Edochie‘s new wife, initiated a dispute where Rita demanded that May Yul-Edochie abandon Yul Edochie‘s surname and use it herself. Rita, a seasoned actress, openly expressed her unhappiness with this request and attributed it to the influence of black magic.

Net Worth

May Yul-Edochie, a prominent Nigerian entrepreneur, boasts an impressive estimated net worth of US$250,000. Notably recognized as the esteemed first wife of Yul Edochie, she has made a name for herself in various business ventures.

Her entrepreneurial prowess and success have garnered her widespread recognition and admiration.
